classDetail.startDateShouldNotBefore: Start Date should not be before End Date
classDetail.hoverText: Hover on any title for more information
classDetail.accessibleHover: Click a course name to see objectives and CEFR statements.
classDetail.courseNameHover: Click a course name to see objectives and CEFR statements.
classDetail.playSimulationsHover: Click the icon to play the simulations yourself.
classDetail.selectSimulation: Select a simulation for more information
classDetail.infoText: Check courses to include in your class.

informationForm.note: Note: This class will be archived after the end date.
informationForm.addTitle: Add a title for your class.

coursesForm.infoText: Check courses to include in your class (you can edit your selections later).

studentsForm.infoText: Enter email addresses, one per line. You can add multiple addresses, and also copy and paste a list into the box.

reviewForm.infoText: Click “Confirm” to create your class. To make changes, click on a heading above, or use the back arrow.

setting.receiveEmail: Receive our newsletter to learn about new developments!

classStudent.topScoreHoverText: This is the highest Mastery Score the student received in each simulation
classStudent.completedStartedHoverText: This column records the amount of times the student has completed this simulation / compared to the amount of times the student has started this simulation
classStudent.turnsPerMinuteHoverText: Number of speaking turns each minute.
classStudent.hintsUsedHoverText: Number of times the transcript or utterances were accessed.
classStudent.timeSpentHoverText: Total time spent on this sim.

addStudents.instructionsText: Enter email addresses, one per line. You can add multiple addresses, and also copy and paste a list into the box.

deleteClass.introText: This class and all of its data will be deleted forever.
deleteClass.confirmText: Are you sure you want to delete this class?

removeStudent.introText: This will permanently remove student(s) from your class!
removeStudent.confirmText: Are you sure you want to remove the selected student(s)?

resendInvitation.introText: You are about to resend an invitation to the following student(s):
resendInvitation.infoText: Invitations will be sent to selected students. If a student has already accepted an invitation, a new invitation will not be sent.

end date.after: Start Date should not be before End Date
